mapper.select: select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.path, m.component, m.`query`, m.route_name, m.hidden, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.frame, m.cache, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num from sys_menu m where m.status = 1 and m.deleted = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.path, m.component, m.`query`, m.route_name, m.hidden, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.frame, m.cache, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num from ( -- -- 角色授权 select p.menu_id from sys_user_role ur join sys_permission p on p.item_type = 1 and p.item_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} -- -- 用户授权 union all select p.menu_id from sys_permission p where p.item_type = 2 and p.item_id = #{userId} ) p join sys_menu m on p.menu_id = m.menu_id where m.status = 1 and m.deleted = 0 group by m.menu_id -- 去掉重复菜单 order by m.parent_id asc , order_num asc

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.path, m.component, m.`query`, m.route_name, m.hidden, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.frame, m.cache, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num from sys_menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 1 and m.deleted = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.path, m.component, m.`query`, m.route_name, m.hidden, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.frame, m.cache, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num from ( -- -- 角色授权 select p.menu_id from sys_user_role ur join sys_permission p on p.item_type = 1 and p.item_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} -- -- 用户授权 union all select p.menu_id from sys_permission p where p.item_type = 2 and p.item_id = #{userId} ) p join sys_menu m on p.menu_id = m.menu_id where m.status = 1 and m.deleted = 0 and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') group by m.menu_id -- 去掉重复菜单 order by m.parent_id asc , order_num asc
